Worlds.Name: VRC-JP 初心者プラザ ［JP］

Worlds.Name: HellGate City
Worlds.Description: After a seemingly normal evening‚ the protagonist goes to bed peacefully‚ only to awaken in a dark‚ devastated world․ The buildings are in ruins‚ streets are littered with debris‚ and a haunting silence hangs in the air․ The night is occasionally pierced by the groans of zombies and the chilling howls of unseen‚ malevolent creatures․ Shadows move unnaturally‚ and an overwhelming sense of dread permeates the atmosphere․ Confused and terrified‚ the man struggles to piece together what has happened and how he ended up in this nightmare world‚ all while desperately trying to stay one step ahead of the horrors lurking in the darkness․
